heading: HR00947
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT, AND OTHER APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEES, TO DIRECT THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA) TO CONDUCT A COMPREHENSIVE AUDIT OF THE AFP/PNP HOUSING PROGRAM BASED ON ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER NO. 9 DATED 11 APRIL 2011 IN ORDER TO AID CONGRESS IN COMING UP WITH SOUND HOUSING POLICIES THAT WOULD BENEFIT THE UNIFORMED PERSONNEL OF THE COUNTRY AS WELL AS TO HOLD ACCOUNTABLE, IF PROVEN TRUE, CONCERNED HOUSING OFFICIALS, PRIVATE DEVELOPERS, AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS WHO CONNIVED TO PROFIT FROM SUCH HOUSING PROGRAMS
status: Pending with the Committee on HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT since 2017-05-16
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00947
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT, AND OTHER APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEES, TO DIRECT THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA) TO CONDUCT A COMPREHENSIVE AUDIT OF THE AFP/PNP HOUSING PROGRAM BASED ON ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER NO. 9 DATED 11 APRIL 2011 IN ORDER TO AID CONGRESS IN COMING UP WITH SOUND HOUSING POLICIES THAT WOULD BENEFIT THE UNIFORMED PERSONNEL OF THE COUNTRY AS WELL AS TO HOLD ACCOUNTABLE, IF PROVEN TRUE, CONCERNED HOUSING OFFICIALS, PRIVATE DEVELOPERS, AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS WHO CONNIVED TO PROFIT FROM SUCH HOUSING PROGRAMS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-04-27
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2017-05-16
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-08;
